section.title: Results
section.text: Laboratory Test: No Lab Tests Information. Laboratory Values/Results: No Lab Results Information.

section.title: Assessments
section.text: The patient Mr John Wright was found to have first degree burns and Dr Seven and his staff treated Mr Wright by cleaning the burn and dressing the burn and observed for couple of hours before discharging Mr Wright.

tr.td: Schedule an appointment with Dr Seven after 1 week for Follow up with Outpatient facility.

observation.text: Schedule an appointment with Dr Seven after 1 week for Follow up with Outpatient facility.

substanceAdministration.text: In case of high fever, take Tylenol according to the following.

list.item: Appointments: Schedule an appointment with Dr Seven after 1 week. Follow up with Outpatient facility.
In case of fever, take Tylenol as advised in plan of treatment.

section.title: Hospital Course
section.text: Mr. John Wright is a 35 year old male who is healthy and visits Community Health Hospitals on 7/22/2015 6pm EST due to a skin burn. The doctor examines the burn, applies the needed dressing and discharges the person after a few hours.

section.title: Discharge Diagnosis
section.text: The doctor examines the burn, applies the needed dressing and discharges the person after a few hours.
